sentences.english: Would my take you hand, would you understand Just how I feel?
sentences.chinese: 我能牽起你的手感受我的內心嗎？

sentences.english: Her inner male counterpart wrote the book on celebrating the body beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她內心對應的那個男性意向對展現外在美很在行。

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你內心深處給了自己失敗的選項，你將會失敗。

sentences.english: I must ask you to still visit with me. My feelings inside do not change.
sentences.chinese: 我求你一定要經常看望我，我內心的感情沒有變。

sentences.english: You need be for balance and contrast, for prayer and inner peace
sentences.chinese: 你需我來趨於衡平，尋求對照，潛心祝禱，舒緩內心。

sentences.english: In inner silence, we experience who we really are.
sentences.chinese: 內心靜默時，我們正體驗着我們真正是誰。

sentences.english: But light struggled with dark in Nixon's soul.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光明與黑暗的對決卻蟄伏於他的內心深處。

sentences.english: Will it receive heartfelt support from the people concerned?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有得到有關人羣發自內心的擁護？

sentences.english: There's something inside us that loves a good monster.
sentences.chinese: 在我們人類內心深處，喜歡有一個好的妖怪。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，真相讓他和很多人內心深處受到極大震撼。

sentences.english: The emotional body is nothing else than the child within you.
sentences.chinese: 情緒身體無外乎就是你內心的小孩。

sentences.english: Mentally strong people recognize that they don't need to please everyone all the time.
sentences.chinese: 內心強大之人深知隨時溜鬚拍馬毫無必要。

sentences.english: When he heard these words, he felt his inner doubts melt away.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這些話時，他感到自己內心的懷疑消失了。

sentences.english: Listen to yourself and do what excites you.
sentences.chinese: 聆聽你內心的想法，做自己想做的事。

sentences.english: Balance is found in the one who faces his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 直面愧疚，內心方獲平衡。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
